quest.name: Alluring Allag
journal:
 Quest Sync
The brusque Loporrit has a mind to do something dangerous, and has clearly heard of your proclivity for recklessness...
objectives: Return to the brusque Loporrit, and defeat any enemies that attack.
Deliver the systems cube to the brusque Loporrit.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: I hear you have a penchant for excitement and adventure, is that correct?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Then I assume in your travels you have doubtless heard tales of the Allagans.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The Allagans? Don't get me started.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes, and nearly everything wrong with the world seems to be their fault.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: I thought as much.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: I ask because I have plans to survey an Allagan relic not far from here. The weapons guarding it, however, make it too dangerous for me to go alone.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: I trust you see where this is going. So, are you interested in a little adventure?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Much obliged. Now, let's be off. No time to waste.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: The crash site is just ahead. If you find anything that may prove useful, I'd be grateful if you could retrieve it for me.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Onward, then. Er... After you.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Large, isn't it? I wonder what secrets it holds...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This bit of Allagan technology is certainly fascinating. A shame it's too bulky to carry back...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This apparatus is offline, but appears to be transportable. You place it in your ambiguously sized bag...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Phew. A moment longer and that drone would have alerted more...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Now, did you find anything of interest?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Oh? Let me have a look...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: No, you're right. It must wait until we get back.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Safe at last. Now, show me what you found.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: This... This is an Allagan decryption unit.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: With it, we could read Allagan tomestones about history, science, poetry... If we had any, which we do not. An adventure for another day, I suppose.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04253
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, I'm deeply excited by the prospect─as I'm sure you can tell. You have my heartfelt gratitude.
